name: github_search_repos
description: Search GitHub repositories by query. Returns repos with name, description, stars, forks, and language.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'machine learning python', 'react component library')

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="results-list"] > div, .repo-list-item'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 10); i++) { const item = items[i]; const linkEl = item.querySelector('a[href*="/"]'); const descEl = item.querySelector('p, .mb-1'); const langEl = item.querySelector('[itemprop="programmingLanguage"], span.repo-language-color + span'); const starsEl = item.querySelector('a[href*="/stargazers"], .mr-3'); const href = linkEl ? linkEl.getAttribute('href') : ''; results.push({ name: href ? href.replace(/^\//, '') : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 200) : '', language: langEl ? langEl.textContent.trim() : '', stars: starsEl ? starsEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: href ? 'https://github.com' + href : '' }); } return { result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract search results
